Document.TEXT: DISCLAIMER You are now leaving Devon Energy’s website and are going to a website that is not operated by Devon Energy. We are not responsible for the content or availability of linked sites. ABOUT THIRD PARTY LINKS ON OUR SITE Devon Energy offers links to other third party websites that may be of interest to our website visitors. When you click on these links you will leave Devon Energy’s website and will be redirected to another site. These sites are not under the control of Devon Energy. Devon Energy is not responsible for the content of linked third party websites. We are not an agent for these third parties nor do we endorse or guarantee any of their opinions, ideas, products, or content . We make no representation or warranty regarding the accuracy of the information contained in the linked sites. We suggest that you always verify the information obtained from linked websites before acting upon this information. Also, please be aware that that the security and privacy policies on these sites may be different from Devon Energy’s policies, so please read third party privacy and security policies closely. If you have any questions or concerns about the products and services offered on linked third party websites, please contact the third party directly. Click “CONTINUE” to acknowledge this disclosure and view the selected website. If you click “CANCEL”, you are acknowledging this disclosure, but you will not be able to view the information. Cancel
